output:
All the leaves fell with the blow The sun was here a minute ago
You're taking off one of your gloves To feel the burn of the snow
You're putting on a guilty smile Before I even realize that I should have stepped aside
Your laugh suddenly echoed I saw my love explode
Between those two dead trees We carve the memories
Your smile dropped innocent As your look dived into mine
You said to me in a breath Your eyes looked like two planet earths
That I hold the whole world into them Before you even realize that you should have stepped aside
My laugh suddenly echoed I saw your love explode
Between those two dead trees We carve the memories
